title: Pediatric OCD Comorbid With GAD, MDD, and ASD
itunes:title: Pediatric OCD Comorbid With GAD, MDD, and ASD
description:
How to untangle pediatric OCD from ASD and GAD? This episode discusses pediatric OCD and its comorbidities: Depression, GAD, and ASD. It includes a discussion on the differences in concerns between OCD and GAD, the assessment of primary and secondary depressive symptoms, and the differences between ASD and OCD rituals. 

Faculty: David Rosenberg, M.D. 
Host: Jessica Diaz, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 1 CME: OCD in Children and Adolescents
  • Pediatric OCD Comorbidity With Depression, Anxiety Disorders, and ASD
